#include <stdio.h>
#include <string.h>
#define author ujjwalgarg

int main(void) {
    int t;
    scanf("%d",&t);
    while(t--) {
        char c[100],s[100];
        scanf("%s",c);
        int l,i,j=0;
        l=strlen(c);
        for(i=l/2-1;i>=0;i--)   s[j]=c[i], j++;
        for(i=l-1;i>=l/2;i--)   s[j]=c[i], j++;
        s[j]='\0';
        printf("%s\n",s);
    }
	return 0;
}
